name: odd-incense
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Psychic moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Psychic-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Breeding: Mr. Mime begets a Mime Jr. Egg.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is an exotic-smelling incense that boosts the power of Psychic-type moves.
